// THIS IS AN AUTOGENERATED FILE

// </copyright>

namespace SimpleAnnPlayground.Graphical
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Gets the graphical object that represents an OutputNeuron.
    /// </summary>
    public partial class Component
    {
        /// <summary>
        /// 
        /// </summary>
        internal static InputNeuron { get; }

        /// <summary>
        /// 
        /// </summary>
        internal static InternalNeuron { get; }

        /// <summary>
        /// 
        /// </summary>
        internal static OutputNeuron { get; }

        /// <summary>
        /// Load the components from their respective files.
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="path">The path where the components are located..</param>
        internal static void ReloadComponents(path)
        {
            InputNeuron.Deserialize(File.ReadAllText(Path.Combine(path, @"InputNeuron.cmpt")));
            InternalNeuron.Deserialize(File.ReadAllText(Path.Combine(path, @"InternalNeuron.cmpt")));
            OutputNeuron.Deserialize(File.ReadAllText(Path.Combine(path, @"OutputNeuron.cmpt")));
        }
    }
}
